post.body: Yep ... home for awhile. My job slows down this time of year ... which I think is a good thing?
The most similar would be Wii Music
We just make them from the gift wrap ... then they match!
ATTN #Meeting Planners - Registration Required http://tinyurl.com/9p7ekl via @ShareThis How does this effect your meetings?
Movie day here ... Plan to watch all 4 Indiana Jones movies in a bit .. Had to postpone from yesterday cuz of work :-(
http://is.gd/dGwu ???? Just last week it was 8!
What a difference 24 hours makes ... where's my coffee???
Feeling better ... but ache everywhere. I think my hair hurts :-(
Not happy ... although at least I waited until AFTER xmas to get sick :-(
Had enough fun for one day ... tweet ya'll later
I think it is time to find food again ...
Cranapple Manhatten ... one of my favorites .... Must be a holiday!

Let the fun begin .... tweet ya'll later! Merry Christmas
Of course .. it is the NON-teenager!
I hear footsteps .... a child is awake!
Almost time to WAKE the kids up .... UGH Teenagers :-) IT'S CHRISTMAS who needs sleep????
Merry Christmas Twitterland! Waiting for children to wake up .....
Rock band II sounds a lot like Rock band .....
